languages.text: "Потому что я не казню, надышавшись дурмана. Не делаю из приговора кровавую пляску. И мое право судить дано мне Империумом, а не подпалубной сектой".

"Because I do not carry out executions in an intoxicant-fuelled haze. Because I do not make a gory spectacle out of my solemn duty. And because I was granted my right to judge by the Imperium, not some below-decks sect."
languages.original_text: "Потому что я не казню, надышавшись дурмана. Не делаю из приговора кровавую пляску. И мое право судить дано мне Империумом, а не подпалубной сектой".

traits.locale_text: "Because I do not carry out executions in an intoxicant-fuelled haze. Because I do not make a gory spectacle out of my solemn duty. And because I was granted my right to judge by the Imperium, not some below-decks sect."

"Because I do not carry out executions in an intoxicant-fuelled haze. Because I do not make a gory spectacle out of my solemn duty. And because I was granted my right to judge by the Imperium, not some below-decks sect."

"Because I do not carry out executions in an intoxicant-fuelled haze. Because I do not make a gory spectacle out of my solemn duty. And because I was granted my right to judge by the Imperium, not some below-decks sect."

"Because I do not carry out executions in an intoxicant-fuelled haze. Because I do not make a gory spectacle out of my solemn duty. And because I was granted my right to judge by the Imperium, not some below-decks sect."

"Because I do not carry out executions in an intoxicant-fuelled haze. Because I do not make a gory spectacle out of my solemn duty. And because I was granted my right to judge by the Imperium, not some below-decks sect."

languages.text: 「俺は、酩酊状態で処刑を行ったりはしない。俺にとって処刑は、血なまぐさい見世物ではなく、厳粛なる義務だ。それに俺は、下層デッキの怪しげな宗派ではなく、帝国から裁きを下す権限を授かっている」
languages.original_text: "Because I do not carry out executions in an intoxicant-fuelled haze. Because I do not make a gory spectacle out of my solemn duty. And because I was granted my right to judge by the Imperium, not some below-decks sect."

traits.locale_text: 「俺は、酩酊状態で処刑を行ったりはしない。俺にとって処刑は、血なまぐさい見世物ではなく、厳粛なる義務だ。それに俺は、下層デッキの怪しげな宗派ではなく、帝国から裁きを下す権限を授かっている」

languages.text: "Weil ich nicht im Drogenrausch Hinrichtungen ausführe. Weil ich aus meiner feierlichen Pflicht kein blutiges Spektakel mache. Und weil ich mein Recht, über andere zu urteilen, vom Imperium erhielt, nicht von einer Sekte von den Unterdecks."
languages.original_text: "Because I do not carry out executions in an intoxicant-fuelled haze. Because I do not make a gory spectacle out of my solemn duty. And because I was granted my right to judge by the Imperium, not some below-decks sect."

traits.locale_text: "Weil ich nicht im Drogenrausch Hinrichtungen ausführe. Weil ich aus meiner feierlichen Pflicht kein blutiges Spektakel mache. Und weil ich mein Recht, über andere zu urteilen, vom Imperium erhielt, nicht von einer Sekte von den Unterdecks."

languages.text: « Parce que je ne procède pas à mes exécutions sous l'influence de substances intoxicantes. Parce que je ne fais pas de mon devoir solennel un spectacle sordide. Et parce que c'est l'Imperium qui m'a accordé le droit de juger, pas une secte de bas étage. »
languages.original_text: "Because I do not carry out executions in an intoxicant-fuelled haze. Because I do not make a gory spectacle out of my solemn duty. And because I was granted my right to judge by the Imperium, not some below-decks sect."

traits.locale_text: « Parce que je ne procède pas à mes exécutions sous l'influence de substances intoxicantes. Parce que je ne fais pas de mon devoir solennel un spectacle sordide. Et parce que c'est l'Imperium qui m'a accordé le droit de juger, pas une secte de bas étage. »

languages.text: «Porque yo estoy sobrio cuando ejecuto a alguien. Porque yo no cumplo mi solemne deber a base de escabechinas. Y porque mi derecho a juzgar me ha sido concedido por el Imperium, no por una secta de sentina».
languages.original_text: "Because I do not carry out executions in an intoxicant-fuelled haze. Because I do not make a gory spectacle out of my solemn duty. And because I was granted my right to judge by the Imperium, not some below-decks sect."

traits.locale_text: «Porque yo estoy sobrio cuando ejecuto a alguien. Porque yo no cumplo mi solemne deber a base de escabechinas. Y porque mi derecho a juzgar me ha sido concedido por el Imperium, no por una secta de sentina».

languages.text: “因为我从来不会一边吸着致幻烟雾，一边执行死刑。因为我不会把我的神圣职责搞成一场鲜血淋漓的狂欢。更是因为，我的审判权是由帝国授予的，而不是底层甲板的什么教派。”
languages.original_text: "Because I do not carry out executions in an intoxicant-fuelled haze. Because I do not make a gory spectacle out of my solemn duty. And because I was granted my right to judge by the Imperium, not some below-decks sect."

traits.locale_text: “因为我从来不会一边吸着致幻烟雾，一边执行死刑。因为我不会把我的神圣职责搞成一场鲜血淋漓的狂欢。更是因为，我的审判权是由帝国授予的，而不是底层甲板的什么教派。”

languages.text: "Çünkü pervasız bir ayyaş değilim. Görevimin kutsiyetini kanlı bir gösteriye dönüştürüp lekelemiyorum. En önemlisi de yargı yetkimi güverte altı bir tarikattan değil, İmparatorluk'tan alıyorum."
languages.original_text: "Because I do not carry out executions in an intoxicant-fuelled haze. Because I do not make a gory spectacle out of my solemn duty. And because I was granted my right to judge by the Imperium, not some below-decks sect."

traits.locale_text: "Çünkü pervasız bir ayyaş değilim. Görevimin kutsiyetini kanlı bir gösteriye dönüştürüp lekelemiyorum. En önemlisi yargı yetkimi güverte altı bir tarikattan değil, İmparatorluk'tan alıyorum."

languages.original_text: "Because I do not carry out executions in an intoxicant-fuelled haze. Because I do not make a gory spectacle out of my solemn duty. And because I was granted my right to judge by the Imperium, not some below-decks sect."
